original_text: But the dragon and his army were not strong enough to win the battle. They no longer had a place for themselves in heaven.
korean_text: 이기지 못하여 다시 하늘에서 그들이 있을 곳을 얻지 못한지라

sentences.original_text: But the dragon and his army were not strong enough
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 용과 그의 군대는 충분히 강하지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: They no longer had a place
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 이상 자신들의 장소를 갖지 않았습니다
